snippet: Lloyd’s may be tempted to focus its next share sale on retail customers after strong demand for the postal service’s shares. But the differences between the two offerings warrant a different approach.
abstract: Lloyd’s may be tempted to focus its next share sale on retail customers after strong demand for the postal service’s shares. But the differences between the two offerings warrant a different approach.

headline.main: Strong Demand for Royal Mail Stock May Not Translate to Lloyds Shares
